actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Subcommittee on Consumer and Regulatory Affairs. Hearings held.
Subcommittee on Consumer and Regulatory Affairs. Hearings concluded. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 101-471.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Consumer and Regulatory Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide access to basic banking services.
short_title: Basic Banking Services Access Act of 1989

summary.text: Basic Banking Services Access Act of 1989 - Requires each depository institution to: (1) offer a basic financial services account to low- and moderate-income persons under prescribed guidelines which include specified minimal deposit, balance, and withdrawal requirements; and (2) post a conspicuous notice of the availability of such accounts to its customers. Prescribes administrative enforcement guidelines. Subjects a depository institution to civil liability for non-compliance with this Act.

titles.title: Basic Banking Services Access Act of 1989
A bill to provide access to basic banking services.
